# blueskynet

The purpose of blueskynet is to provide tools to generate and analyze
networks from Bluesky Social,

## Installation

You can install the development version of blueskynet like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/lassehjorthmadsen/blueskynet.git")
```

## Getting started

First, create an app password here:
<https://bsky.app/settings/app-passwords>.

Then, set environment variable BLUESKY_APP_PASS to your app password,
and another variable, BLUESKY_APP_USER, to your identifier
(e.g. “lassehjorthmadsen.bsky.social”) using `file.edit("~/.Renviron")`

Now, you can access the core function of `blueskynet`:

``` r
library(blueskynet)
library(dplyr)

# Authenticate yourself
password <- Sys.getenv("BLUESKY_APP_PASS")
identifier <- Sys.getenv("BLUESKY_APP_USER")

# Then get a token and a refresh token
auth_object <- get_token(identifier, password)
token <- auth_object$accessJwt
refresh_tok <- auth_object$refreshJwt

# Establish a small net as a starting point
key_actor <- "natalieamiri.bsky.social"
keywords <- c("reporter", "journalist", "writer")
small_net <- init_net(key_actor, keywords, token)
```

First few rows of a starting point initial network:

``` r
small_net |> head(3)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 2
#>   actor_handle             follows_handle          
#>   <chr>                    <chr>                   
#> 1 natalieamiri.bsky.social saschalobo.bsky.social  
#> 2 natalieamiri.bsky.social heute.nachrichten.com.de
#> 3 natalieamiri.bsky.social iranjournal.bsky.social
```

When you’re ready, you can build a bigger net, with several supporting
artifacts, like a 3d-widget, using
[`build_network()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/build_network.md)
which we won’t run here, since it can take a lot of time to build a big
network.

## Example application

Have a look at a network of influential scientists on Bluesky Social,
generated with `blueskynet`
[here](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskyanalyses/).

## Documentation

`blueskynet` has a [pkddown](https://pkgdown.r-lib.org/index.html)
website for documentation right
[here](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/index.html).

# Package index

## Wrapper functions

Functions around individual endpoint in the Bluesky Social API

- [`get_token()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_token.md)
  : Get authentication token for Bluesky API
- [`refresh_token()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/refresh_token.md)
  : Refresh authentication token for Bluesky API
- [`verify_token()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/verify_token.md)
  : Verify authentication token validity
- [`get_profiles()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_profiles.md)
  : Get profile information for Bluesky users
- [`get_follows()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_follows.md)
  : Get accounts followed by a user
- [`get_followers()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_followers.md)
  : Get followers of a Bluesky user
- [`get_user_posts()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_user_posts.md)
  : Retrieve posts from a Bluesky user
- [`follow_actor()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/follow_actor.md)
  : Follow a user on Bluesky Social
- [`unfollow_actor()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/unfollow_actor.md)
  : Unfollow a user on Bluesky Social
- [`get_all_follow_records()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/get_all_follow_records.md)
  : Get complete follow records from user repository
- [`extract_follow_subjects()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/extract_follow_subjects.md)
  : Extract subject DIDs from follow records
- [`find_follow_record()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/find_follow_record.md)
  : Find follow record for specific actor

## Network functions

Functions for creating and analyzing networks.

- [`add_metrics()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/add_metrics.md)
  : Add network analysis metrics to user profiles
- [`build_network()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/build_network.md)
  : Build complete network analysis pipeline
- [`com_labels()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/com_labels.md)
  : Generate labels for network communities
- [`create_widget()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/create_widget.md)
  : Create interactive 3D network visualization widget
- [`expand_net()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/expand_net.md)
  : Expand network through iterative growth
- [`init_net()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/init_net.md)
  : Initialize a network from key actors
- [`trim_net()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/trim_net.md)
  : Clean and trim network to create cohesive community
- [`word_freqs()`](https://lassehjorthmadsen.github.io/blueskynet/reference/word_freqs.md)
  : Calculate word frequencies from text data
